exceptions.exn: In environment u, v : nat -> R Hv : eventually (fun n : nat => v n <= u n) Hu : is_lim_seq u m_infty P : R -> Prop Unable to unify "Rbar_locally p_infty P" with "Rbar_locally m_infty P".

original: intros Hv Hu. apply is_lim_seq_le_p_loc. - intros n. specialize (Hv n). specialize (Hu n). apply Hv. - apply Hu.
